definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: thunder-bolt, lightning flash (NH [[חֲזִיוּ]]; Aram. [[חֲוִיזׇא]] shining cloud)—only cstr. [[חֲזִיז]] and pl. [[חֲזִיזִים]]; [[וְדֶרֶח לַחֲזִיז קׂלוֹת]] Job 28:26 and a way for thunder-bolts = Job 38:25; [[עשֶׁׂה חֲזִיזִים]] ´[[י]] Zec 10:1 (‖[[מְטַר־ גֶּשֶׁם]]).
